entry.title: kvr06-ai/whispers-in-the-dark: Whispers in the Dark is an interactive text-based horror game where players explore a haunted house, making choices that shape the narrative and lead to multiple endings. Designed as a lightweight, browser-based web application, it uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to deliver an immersive experience without requiring downloads or plugins.
entry.content: Whispers in the Dark is an interactive text-based horror game where players explore a haunted house, making choices that shape the narrative and lead to multiple endings. Designed as a lightweight, browser-based web application, it uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to deliver an immersive experience without requiring downloads or plugins.
